dcterms:creator: S.P. Singh
T. Jaakkola
M.I. Jordan
dcterms:description: This dataset involves learning without state estimation in partially observable Markovian decision processes, focusing on the convergence of Q-learning algorithms.
dcterms:title: POMDPs with measurements viewed as state variables

dcterms:creator: A.D. Kara
S. Yüksek
dcterms:description: This dataset examines the convergence of finite memory Q-learning for partially observable Markov decision processes (POMDPs) and the near optimality of learned policies under filter stability conditions.
dcterms:title: Q-learning with finite window measurements

dcterms:creator: S. Dong
B. van Roy
Z. Zhou
dcterms:description: This dataset focuses on reinforcement learning in complex environments, where agents respond to their environments with efficient learning strategies.
dcterms:title: Reinforcement learning under complex environments

dcterms:creator: S. Chandak
V.S. Borkar
P. Dodhia
dcterms:description: This dataset investigates reinforcement learning in non-Markovian environments, focusing on the convergence of Q-learning algorithms.
dcterms:title: Q-learning under non-Markovian environments

dcterms:creator: A.D. Kara
S. Yüksek
dcterms:description: This dataset explores the near optimality of finite memory feedback policies in partially observed Markov decision processes.
dcterms:title: Finite memory feedback policies in partially observed Markov decision processes

dcterms:creator: A.D. Kara
S. Yüksek
dcterms:description: This dataset focuses on Q-learning for continuous state and action Markov decision processes under average cost criteria.
dcterms:title: Q-learning for continuous state and action MDPs under average cost criteria
